Name: Name Change, Osvaldo Vega Plaza, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to a plaza name, Osvaldo Vega Plaza, Borough of Manhattan.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits
Osvaldo Vega Plaza			none			the intersection of East 106th Street   
                                                                                                and Third Avenue	


													
      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
